titleStmt.title: Take time, while time is being an exhortation to all sorts or sexes, of what degree soever, from the highest to the lowest, old or young, rich or poore. To the tune of, The ladies daughter of Paris.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. P[arsons] for H. Gosson, dwelling vpon London-bridge, neere the Gate,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Oh stay a while you lusty lads,".
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
